# _Status Module_

[![Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/WoW-CMS/bc-status?style=flat-square&logo=github&color=green)](https://github.com/WoW-CMS/bc-status/releases)

## Requirements

* [BlizzCMS](https://github.com/WoW-CMS/BlizzCMS) v2+
